definition: overall character or appearance to the mind : complexion, aspect

examples: all the hues of the rainbow
the hues and shades of twilight

definition: the attribute of colors that permits them to be classed as red, yellow, green, blue, or an intermediate between any contiguous pair of these colors, — compare brightness sense 2, lightness sense 2a, saturation sense 4
city and port in central Vietnam; formerly capital of Annam population 302,983
